title: is my laptop complatible with the game. hellllpppp pleaseeee
body: Hey I'm a girl who is new to the world of online gaming and I really want to play this, I have tried downloading it twice already but it has failed both times, I don't know what the problem is and I was thinking maybe it was my laptop because it is a cheap model. idk please help I have a dell inspiron 11 3000 series laptop that is not touch screen.

replies.body: According to the spec sheet and our [minimum requirements page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/), you should be compatible. What specific issues were you having when trying to instal the game?
